metadata.description:
Wallace and Gromit, the beloved inventor and his faithful dog, are back with a series of all-new adventures! 

8 incredible escapades await inside this fantastic collection of the Wallace & Gromit Daily Strips.

Whether it's grinning and bearing it with some home dentistry, bringing in the honey with a rooftop beehive, or spicing up the local park with a robotic dinosaur, Wallace's days are filled with fun, surprises... and terrible puns!
metadata.name: Wallace & Gromit Dailies
